Government
==========

9

1

1

2

1. #### [About Our City](https://www.foresthilltx.org/182/About-Our-City)

   Forest Hill is one of the fastest growing communities in North Texas.
2. #### [Mayor & City Council](https://www.foresthilltx.org/195/Mayor-City-Council)

   The Mayor and six City Council members are the elected officials of Forest Hill.
3. #### [Boards, Commissions, Committees & Societies](https://www.foresthilltx.org/183/Boards-Commissions-Committees-Societies)

   Find current Boards, Commissions, Committees, and other volunteer positions.
4. #### [City Manager](https://www.foresthilltx.org/157/City-Manager)

   The City Manager ensures that vital services, programs, and facilities are maintained to meet the needs of the community.
5. #### [City Secretary](https://www.foresthilltx.org/158/City-Secretary)

   The City Secretary is the official keeper of City records.
6. #### [Agendas & Minutes](https://www.foresthilltx.org/273/Agendas-Minutes)
7. #### [Live Meetings](https://boxcast.tv/channel/pjgomps0mpsditlrc9at)
8. #### [Code of Ordinances](https://www.foresthilltx.org/194/Code-of-Ordinances)

   View the Code of Ordinances.
